sub_title: Interim manager in international development, humanitarian & political affairs | available
summary:
I offer (interim) management and advice services in strategic co-creation processes, (re)structuring and leading teams, organizations and (cooperative) networks. I bring substantive senior leadership experience in international humanitarian and political affairs, human rights, microcredit, psycho-social fields, child rights, including fundraising. 

➢	With strong analytic skills, political and personal sensitivity I manage organizational and/or political complex (crisis) situations; 

➢	keeping a clear overview and focusing on the organizational objectives, multi-stakeholders’ interests and staff roles;

➢	bringing people and organizations’ purposes together by being compassionate with empowered staff; 

➢	building sound governance structures and propagating organizational hygiene. 

Furthermore I:
➢	analyse situations and organizations rather quickly, 
➢	bring a large and diverse international and intercultural experience to the table,
➢	switch easily on different levels and remaining available to staff and superiors
➢	bring seniority and make staff feel secure while empowering them.

My mediation, legal and systemic constellations' background facilitates sound and respectful balancing of interests. As a certified RealDrives trainer I aim at improving collaboration at the workplace, (self-)management, inclusiveness, diversity and recruitment of staff.

I believe in trust, meaning, responsibility, communication, organizational hygiene and the strength of collaboration in order to achieve results and having fun at the same time. 

Striving towards a more equitable world in a professional manner is my drive.

I also offer support in finding and dealing with ineffective behavorial and organizational patterns.

In conflict situations I mediate, zoom out in order to focus and act!
